docs.title: Issues

docs.text: 1. Invalid OTP It's as a result of inputting the incorrect OTP by the user solution implimented Autofill OTP so that a user does not have to type the OTP instead it will be autotype 2. OTP does not expire It's as a result of comparing the OTP date created with the OTP expering date and it will make someone to reuse the OTP solution implimented Changed the date comparison from date created against expering date to current date against expired date 3. App crushing Solution By clearing app cache 4. Issue on logging into the app It's as a result of someone have to login into the app everytime when using the app solution implimented Automtic login so that someone does not have to login into the app everytime when using the app 5. Delay on Receiving the OTP Solution By activating the promotional messages 6. Resseting pin issue when someone blocks an account and tries to unbock it It's as a result of broken UI. solution implimented Updating the UI
